participant_1.background:
I got a puppy for my birthday.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
I love to cuddle up with my pug on rainy days.
I want a place to cook and to entertain my friends and family.
I went to the cinema with friends to watch the latest action movie.

participant_2.background:
I am still haunted by the events of that day, but I am trying to move on with my life.
i have been married for five years.
I have been in the wedding planning business for four years now.
I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them.
I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.

content.text: Hi there, how is your day going?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. It is my birthday today!
Thank you! I got a puppy for my birthday.
That's amazing! I love dogs. What kind of puppy did you get?
I got a pug. I've always wanted one.
Pugs are so cute! I'm sure you'll love him.
I already do. He's so cuddly.
I'm glad to hear that. I love animals. I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them.
I'm the same way. I have a few close friends, but I don't need a lot of people in my life.
That's good. Quality is better than quantity.
I agree. I'm glad I found you. You seem really nice.
Thank you. You seem nice too. Maybe we can be friends.
Great! I'm free tomorrow if you want to hang out.
I'm free tomorrow too. That sounds like fun.
Great! I'll text you my number
